item.description:
Friday, March 14th at The Java Room, Chelmsford, MA 6:30pm

"Allied Folk" is a high-energy trio of good friends playing classic and contemporary folk music. Their wide musical interests also take them into some rockabilly, blues, and swing music territories. In honor of St. Patrick?s Day, they will have a special set of Irish music, so come and join in on the fun!

Come to The Java Room, a fun, cozy place to gather for casual conversation, live music performances, yummy java drinks, and games...
We'll have Apples to Apples and Uno, you can bring along any other card games you might have as well. This will be a relaxing evening and fun way to get to know other singles in the area. Hope to see you there.

In addition to great coffees, the Java Room also serves light food,
cocktails, frozen drinks, wine etc.

http://www.thejavaroo...
item.how_to_find_us: This event is hosted by Rhonda and Karen. Everyone should be easy to find in this small, friendly venue.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Jazz, Java and Friends....
